headline: Is Universal Health Services Still a Bargain After 36% Surge and Mental Health Expansion?
summary: Wondering if Universal Health Services is a hidden gem or priced to perfection? You are not alone. Investors on the hunt for opportunity are zeroing in on its valuation story right now. The stock has seen a sharp run lately, climbing 7.1% in the last week, 14.1% over 30 days, and posting impressive gains of 35.9% year-to-date. Recent headlines highlight the company’s expansion into new healthcare facilities and renewed focus on mental health services. This has fueled optimism and brought...
